```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(bbplot)
library(scales)
library(forecast)
library(tsbox)
```


```{r}
data <- read_csv("data/cases.csv")
```

```{r fig.height=10, fig.width=20}
data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=day, y=cases)) +
  geom_line() +
  bbc_style()
```
```{r fig.height=10, fig.width=20}
ts_c(data %>% select(cases)) %>%
  auto.arima() %>%
  forecast(h = 15) %>%
  autoplot() +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = comma) +
  bbc_style()
```
```{r fig.height=10, fig.width=20}
ts_c(data %>% select(cases)) %>%
  forecast::ma(order=4) %>% 
  forecast(h = 15) %>%
  autoplot() +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = comma) +
  bbc_style()
```
